0.name: Ice Crampon Technique
0.fullDesc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of this character's Max HP to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Salted Camping Cans
0.fullDesc: Applies "Survival Response" to a single target ally and increases their Max HP by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Lynx's Max HP plus <orangeStrong>{{2}}</orangeStrong>. If the target ally is a character on the Path of Destruction or Preservation, the chance of them being attacked by enemies will greatly increase. "Survival Response" lasts for {{3}} turn(s).\nRestores the target's HP by <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong> of Lynx's Max HP plus <orangeStrong>{{5}}</orangeStrong>.
0.shortDesc: Applies "Survival Response" to a single ally, <color=#f29e38ff>increases their Max HP</color>, and restores their HP.

0.name: Snowfield First Aid
0.fullDesc: Dispels {{1}} <u>debuff(s)</u> from all allies and immediately restores their respective HP by an amount equal to <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> of Lynx's Max HP plus <orangeStrong>{{3}}</orangeStrong>.
0.shortDesc: Dispels <color=#f29e38ff>1 <u>debuff</u> from all allies</color> and restores their HP.

0.name: Chocolate Energy Bar
0.fullDesc: After Lynx uses her Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted her Talent's continuous healing effect, lasting for {{1}} turn(s).
0.shortDesc: After this character uses her Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted a continuous healing effect.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
